short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Habit Killer helps you get control of yor life. Habit Killer does this by making your time on sites you blocked, suck.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Habit Killer is a product designed to increase your productivity on the web, whether it be for sites like Twitter, FaceBook, or Google. Habit Killer achieves this by making you get negitive stimulus everytime you go onto the sites you block. Habit Killer makes the blocked site covered with a huge annoying bright background, making you have to strain your eyes to read the text or play the game. Habit Killer helps you get rid of social media or game distractions and allows you to take control of your life!
